bike.description: Specialized FACT 6r carbon, triple monocoque, compact race geometry, Zertz seatstay inserts

components.description: Specialized FACT monocoque carbon fork, full carbon legs, crown and steerer, with Speed Zertz.
Specialized Mindset Plus, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, sealed stainless steel cartridge bearings, carbon 20mm cone with two 5mm alloy spacers
S-Works FACT carbon stem, magnesium face plate, 31.8mm handlebar clamp
S-Works FACT carbon aero handlebar, racing drop, ergo/aero shaping, 31.8mm clamp diameter
Body Geometry Bar Phat, cork ribbon with 2.5mm gel padding
Shimano Ultegra
Shimano Ultegra
Shimano Dura-Ace, 10-speed, STI, flight deck compatible
Shimano Ultegra, 31.8mm clamp, bottom pull
Shimano Dura-Ace, short cage
Shimano Dura-Ace, 10-speed, STI, flight deck compatible
Shimano Ultegra, 12-25t
Shimano Dura-Ace, 10-speed
FSA SLK MegaExo, 2-piece carbon crankset
FSA integrated, exterior cartridge bearings, alloy
Composite-body test ride pedals
Mavic Ksyrium Elite, welded aluminum double wall rim, machined sidewalls
Mavic Ksyrium Elite, 18 hole, Mavic QR
Mavic Ksyrium Elite, 20 hole, Mavic QR
Stainless 14g aero
Specialized Mondo Pro, 700x23C, aramid bead, 120TPI
Specialized Mondo Pro, 700x23C, aramid bead, 120TPI
Specialized standard presta tube, 0.9mm thickness
Body Geometry Alias, carbon reinfoced base, hollow titanium rails, microfiber cover
Specialized Pavé FACT carbon seatpost with Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Specialized, forged/CNC, double wedge
Chain stay protector, reflectors, chain catcher, clear coat, owners manual
